document_name: Prodoc/Supporting the Republic of Belarus in Addressing Irregular Migration and Promoting Human Rights of Vulnerable Migrants
00071600_photo from  the meeting of the Project Steering Committee

outputs.output_descr:
State Border Committee recruitment, training plans and training strategies assessed, updated, developed and approved; adequate technical capacity of the State Border Committee Training Centre is built.
Technical and institutional capacity of the State Border Committee Psychological Support Service is enhanced.
Sexual Gender-Based Violence/Trafficking in Human Beings (SGBV/THB) cases among migrants in detention and reception facilities are better identified and more effectively prevented; adequate protection and assistance is provided to the victims.

project_descr: Supporting the Republic of Belarus in Addressing Irregular Migration and Promoting Human Rights of Vulnerable Migrants
project_title: Addressing Irregular Migration and Promoting Human Right
